title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 502.4 - Exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 502.4 - Exceptions

State Regulations

Water-works corporations having now on file with this
commission rules and regulations in connection with the construction and
maintenance of service pipe need not submit such rules except when amendments
are necessary to comply with the requirements of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
502.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
